summary: THERE IS AN ODOR COMING FROM THE EXHAUST.  I HAVE TAKEN THE CAR TO THE DEALER TWO TIMES FOR THIS, AND THEY TOLD ME IT WAS THE GAS I WAS BUYING.  SO I STARTED BUYING GAS OUT OF TOWN FOR A WHILE, THE ODOR CONTINUES.  I HAVE 12,000 MILES ON THE CAR, AND THE ODOR KEEPS GETTING PROGRESSIVELY WORSE.  BUT THE DEALER KEEPS TELLING ME IT IS THE GAS, AND OFFERS NO HELP.*AK
